data.title: While physics laureate Albert Einstein might be known for his scientific achievements, he was also a humanitarian who supported causes...
data.meta_description:
8,316 likes, 75 comments - nobelprize_org on November 10, 2023: "While physics laureate Albert Einstein might be known for his scientific achievements, he was also a humanitarian who supported causes which helped people around the world.

As a refugee who fled Nazi persecution in Germany, @alberteinstein and his wife made visa applications for other German Jews. They supported fellow refugees fleeing Nazi Germany because there were no programs or agencies to help their fellow refugees.

In July 1933, Einstein spearheaded a committee of over 50 American artists, intellectuals and political leaders to form the International Relief Association, which would later become @rescueorg.

Learn more about Einstein through the link in our bio.".
